ygData.subject: Re: A few words about bards  - OT
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ok, either Verant changed something, or one of us got extraordinarily lucky.  My friends and I were there for several days a couple weeks ago sweeping the
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 2 Aug 1999, Benoit St-Hilaire wrote:
>
> I have to disagree, the cold iron morningstar is not the
> rare loot, the runed circlet is... On the same rare spawn,
> but he carry the morningstar a lot more than the
> circlet...
>
> I whent there with my friend to get him a circlet... we
> had 3 morningstars before we finaly got a circlet...

Ok, either Verant changed something, or one of us got
extraordinarily lucky. My friends and I were there for
several days a couple weeks ago sweeping the lower level parts
of the dungeon. We got... 5 circlets and zero morningstars.
Some other people who were there trying to get a morningstar
were auctioning circlets because all their casters already had
one.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
